title: Hydrophilicity and surface charge modulation of Ti3C2Tx MXene based membranes for water desalination
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21635-21643
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02678K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Laxmi Pandey, Wentao Liang, Armin VahidMohammadi, Teng Zhang, Yury Gogotsi, Meni Wanunu
Unique chemistry and disorder created by intermixing of Ti3C2Tx and WS2 nanosheets in a membrane help to improve water permeance, whereas functionalization with an anionic polymer improves salt rejection when tested in a pressurized system.
